name: C Y B Î£ R UserBot
description: CYBER UserBot is the most advantageous and fast UserBot with changeable language and permanent plugin system.

SPOTIFY_DC.description: The code needed for Spotify bio. (Leave it if you don't know how tp get it).

SPOTIFY_KEY.description: The code needed for Spotify bio. (Leave it if you don't know how tp get it).

HEROKU_MEMEZ.description: This value must be True if UserBot is running on a Heroku Dyno.

HEROKU_APIKEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

OPEN_WEATHER_MAP_APPID.description: Get your APP ID(API KEY) from the address https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather.

BOTLOG.description: Set to 'True' if you want to get logs of your bot.

GENIUS.description: Type the Genius API Token you received here.

AUTO_PP.description: It is the variable required for the Autopp module to work. You need to enter the direct address of the image you will use for it to work.

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: ChatID of the log group. Set to '0' if BOTLOG= False and/or LOGSPAMMER= False.

CONSOLE_LOGGER_VERBOSE.description: If you need the detail in the console log, set it to True.

PM_AUTO_BAN.description: PM Auto Ban Feature. 'Hey! It's a bot.' module.

PM_AUTO_BAN_LIMIT.description: PM Auto Ban limit. If users send you x messages, they will be blocked.

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: YouTube Data API key for .yt command. Get it at https://console.cloud.google.com.

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: OCR API Key for .ocr command. Get it at https://ocr.space/ocrapi.

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: API Key for .rbg command. Get it from https://www.remove.bg/api.

ANTI_SPAMBOT.description: Kicks spambots from groups after joining. (Requires admin privileges to kick).

ANTI_SPAMBOT_SHOUT.description: If you don't have admin privileges to kick, report spambots to admins after joining the group with this.

TMP_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: Download location for many modules (GDrive, .download etc.).

CLEAN_WELCOME.description: When a new person joins, the old welcome message is deleted with this.

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Enter the client id for Google Drive.

LASTFM_API.description: API Key for Last.FM module. (Get one from - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create).

LASTFM_SECRET.description: SECRET Key for Last.FM module. (Get one from - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create).

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Enter the client secret for Google Drive.

G_DRIVE_AUTH_TOKEN_DATA.description: Enter the Google Drive authentication data as a JSON structure.

WEATHER_DEFCITY.description: Set default city for UserBot's weather module.

LOGSPAMMER.description: Set this value to True if you want error logs to be stored in the UserBot log group instead of sending the file in the current chat. Requires a valid BOTLOG_CHATID value to be set.

WARN_LIMIT.description: Number of alerts required to gmute/gban the contact. Usually 3.

WARN_MODE.description: The event that will occur after 3 warnings. You can just type gmute or gban. Otherwise, the bot may not work.

GALERI_SURE.description: It is for gallery plugin. How many seconds should profile photos change?.

PAKET_ISMI.description: Specify the syntax command package name. The package name will be: The value you give @UserName is 1.

OTOMATIK_KATILMA.description: Type False if you don't want to automatically join the Support group and Channel.

LANGUAGE.description: The language of the bot. You can write EN/TR/AZ/UZ.
